Title: Relates to needs assessment and rate adequacy determination for medical assistance
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to evaluate existing needs assessment tools and develop additional professionally and statistically valid assessment tools to be used to assist in determining the amount, nature and manner of services and care needs of individuals receiving medical assistance and care.
LawCode: Amd §§365-a & 364-j, Soc Serv L; amd §4403-f, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to needs assessment and rate adequacy for medicaid
